alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 3:26AM MST until December 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, Upper Tularosa Valley and Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects such as holiday decorations. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Upper Tularosa Valley
